resources.string: Jesus knows your situation. He knows you by name. Come to Him and He will give you rest. If you still haven\'t accepted Him as your personal Lord and Savior, you may begin by saying this prayer

Dear God, thank you because you know me. Thank you because you died and rose again for me. Forgive me for all my sins. I accept You as my Lord and Savior and from now on, help me to live for You. In Jesus name, amen.

Dear God, thank you because you know me. Thank you because you died and rose again for me. Forgive me for all my sins. I accept You as my Lord and Savior and from now on, help me to live for You. In Jesus name, amen.
Are you looking for a Church to grow your faith? Feel free to attend our Worship Service. For detailed information, you may visit www.jsoscc.com/contact-us
Feel free to contact me for mistyped Bible verses, bug reports, donations, or sideline projects. God bless you!
This challenge originated from JSOS Christian Church wherein attendees should be able to memorize the following verses:
